title: How to Learn Flask
description: Learning Flask, a lightweight and powerful Python web framework, can be a rewarding journey for web development. Here's a description of how to get started with Flask:
author: Abhay bro
steps: Python Fundamentals: Begin by mastering the basics of Python, as Flask is a Python web framework. Understand variables, data types, loops, functions, and object-oriented programming.
Web Basics: Familiarize yourself with web development fundamentals, including how the web works, HTTP protocols, and how web servers and browsers communicate.
